version_description:
This version supports iOS 8, iOS 7, iOS 6 and iOS 5. Please contact us immediately at iPhone@i4software.com if you experience ANY further problems with this update. Let us know your device model and iOS version and please describe the problem in detail.

IF YOU LIKE FAST CAMERA AND WANT TO SEE FURTHER UPDATES, PLEASE ENCOURAGE US BY TAKING A MINUTE TO WRITE A REVIEW ON THE APP STORE. LET US KNOW WHAT YOU LIKE NOW AND WHAT YOU WOULD LIKE TO SEE ADDED IN FUTURE VERSIONS.

Improvements to Turbo Mode.
Note: Turn ON Turbo Mode in Settings for 30 photos per second @ 12MP on 6s and 6s Plus.
All Filters are now free. No more in-app purchases!

Fixed Reported Crashes.
*Please email us at iPhone@i4software.com if you experience a crash.
Urgent Update Resolved Reported Crashes and Folder Deletion Issue. Please email us at i4phone@i4software.com if you find any additional crashes or other issues.

Major version release 10.0 for 2019. Fast Camera has been completely updated for the latest iOS devices including iPhone X, XS, XS Max, XR and the new iPads. Modernized user interface for settings and review screens.

• Turbo Mode now captures up to 30 photos per second at 12MP (3024x4032)
• Portrait Depth Mode now captures and exports Depth Mask images at full 12MP resolution
• Dim Mode has been improved to lengthen battery life by dimming the screen for extended time-lapse sessions.
• Max Picture Limit increased to 4000
• Now supports switching between 1.2MP, 2.1MP, 8MP and 12MP on 12MP devices
• Now supports 7MP front camera capture on supported devices
• Allows up to 4K 60fps video export

• Fixes for Library and iPad landscape view. 
• Updated for iOS 13 and iPhone 11 series of devices.
• Added support for Ultra Wide and Tele cameras on latest iPhones.

IMPORTANT UPDATE
• Fixed folder and image gallery sorting order
• Fixed 12MP setting resolution issues
• Fixed User Interface buttons
• Fixed time related crash
